特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
Face to face format

Students will practice all four skills (listening, speaking, reading, writing) over the course of the semester. Homework assignments will often be used for discussions in later classes. Projects/presentations will require students to do some research and will focus on developing small and large group presentation skills.

第1回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第2回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第3回: Work on 25,000 words #1, Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第4回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第5回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第6回: Prepare for presentation #1, work on 25,000 words #2, students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第7回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第8回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第9回: Work on 25,000 words #3, students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第10回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第11回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第12回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第13回: Work on Presentation #2, work on 25,000 words #4, students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
第14回: Students can expect at least 60+ minutes of homework per class
